name: Charles Towne Plumbing
address: 4952 Rivers Ave, North Charleston, SC 29406, USA

reviews.author: Caleb Hund
reviews.text: The Charles Towne Plumbing crew is great! Very knowledgeable and professional. They get straight to the point and don’t mess around. I highly recommend them for all your plumbing needs.

reviews.author: Kristin Milam
reviews.text: They were able to come out same day to one of our rental properties. Our tech Chris was personable and professional. He diagnosed the problem and made repairs quickly. Would recommend and use again.

reviews.author: Katie Hogan
reviews.text: We’ve used this plumbing company before and they’re always great, but Will was awesome. I called the day before and he showed up the next day - right on time at 8am. Will was super communicative and went above and beyond to fix our issue. He took the time to explain the problem and did everything he could to get us back up and running. Will definitely be our go-to moving forward — highly highly recommend!

reviews.author: Kevin Alford
reviews.text: Sean did an amazing job to get us up and running again. A blocked drain line had everything shutdown, including toilets, showers and sinks. He stayed late into the night to ensure we had our necessary services returned. I was pleased to get same day service in addition to a professional and courteous staff. I wouldn’t hesitate to call Charles Towne Plumbing in the future.

reviews.author: Wes Denney
reviews.text:
Brown Dog Deli experienced an emergency situation, and Charles Towne Plumbing responded quickly and professionally. They were fast, efficient, affordable, and handled the issue with complete resolve.

Chris was an amazing and knowledgeable technician who was even willing to show up at five in the morning so we could get everything taken care of without missing a beat in our business operations.

I would certainly highly recommend Charles Towne Plumbing, and we will absolutely be using them for our future needs. You should do the same.
